name: Tower Rush (honased)
description:
Team

  • Eric Honas
  • Mason Wittman

In this tower defense game, you must constantly fend  off incoming enemies while balancing buying and maintaining towers. All art is original.

Controls:

WASD - Move

E - Interact

How to play:

After starting the game with [Enter], there are tower shops on the left. Go to one and buy a tower (press [E]). The cheapest and least powerful tower is on the bottom. With it above your head, go to one of the available plots (marked by a sign) and place it down. It will begin shooting any incoming enemies. Enemies killed will get you more coins, with which you can buy more towers.

There is a "wind-up" bar above each tower. It progressively winds down until completely empty and will stop shooting. While your player is touching a tower, mash [E] to wind up the tower again.

Finally, don't let enemies leave through the other side. You have 5 hearts, and each enemy through hurts. Try to survive until the end (there is a win and a lose condition).

Game Jam Theme: Can't Stop

- While constantly having to buy and place towers while rewinding already placed towers, you cannot stop moving around and interacting otherwise you will surely lose.
